  \caption[Weekly risk budgets and exposure rules]{Weekly risk budgets, market caps, and exposure rules tied to CVaR/Kelly math. All parameters are calibrated to maintain CVaR$_{0.05}$ within 2.5\% weekly bankroll loss under stress scenarios.}
\budgetsLabel
  \begin{threeparttable}
    \setlength{\tabcolsep}{6pt}\renewcommand{\arraystretch}{1.15}
\begin{tabularx}{\linewidth}{@{} X l l l @{}}
    \toprule
    \textbf{Parameter}  & \textbf{Value}  & \textbf{Range}  & \textbf{Rationale} \\
    \midrule
    \multicolumn{4}{@{}l}{\textit{\textbf{Kelly Staking Parameters}}} \\
    \quad Kelly fraction ($\kappa$) & 0.25 & [0.125, 0.50] & Quarter Kelly: optimal risk-adjusted growth \\
    \quad Max bet fraction ($c$) & 5\% & [2\%, 10\%] & Per-bet bankroll cap (hard limit) \\
    \quad Min edge threshold & 1.0\% & [0.5\%, 2.0\%] & Minimum edge to place bet \\
    \quad LCB quantile ($\alpha_{\text{LCB}}$) & 0.05 & [0.05, 0.10] & Lower credible bound for $p$ (Eq.~\ref{eq:lcb-kelly}) \\[0.5ex]
    \multicolumn{4}{@{}l}{\textit{\textbf{CVaR Risk Constraints}}} \\
    \quad CVaR confidence ($\alpha$) & 0.05 & [0.01, 0.10] & 95th percentile tail risk (Eq.~\ref{eq:cvar-prog}) \\
    \quad Weekly CVaR budget & 2.5\% & [1.5\%, 5.0\%] & Maximum portfolio loss at $\alpha{=}0.05$ \\
    \quad Scenarios ($B$) & 10,000 & [5k, 50k] & Monte Carlo draws for CVaR LP \\[0.5ex]
    \multicolumn{4}{@{}l}{\textit{\textbf{Portfolio Exposure Limits}}} \\
    \quad Single-market cap\tnote{a} & 10\% & [5\%, 15\%] & Max exposure to any one game \\
    \quad Correlated-market cap\tnote{b} & 25\% & [15\%, 40\%] & Max exposure to SGP/teaser legs \\
    \quad Weekly total exposure & 100\% & [50\%, 150\%] & Sum of all stake fractions (allows leverage) \\[0.5ex]
    \multicolumn{4}{@{}l}{\textit{\textbf{Drawdown \& Governance}}} \\
    \quad Max drawdown threshold & 20\% & [15\%, 30\%] & Pause trading if exceeded (§\ref{subsec:ruin}) \\
    \quad Variance budget multiplier & 1.5× & [1.2×, 2.0×] & Realized variance vs expected \\
    \quad OPE gate: min $\hat V(\pi)$ & 0.0 & [-0.02, +0.05] & Conservative lower bound acceptance \\
    \bottomrule
  \end{tabularx}
\begin{tablenotes}
  \footnotesize
  \item[a] Single-market cap prevents overconcentration on individual games.
  \item[b] Correlated-market cap accounts for dependence in same-game parlays (SGP) and teasers.
\end{tablenotes}
